wps:Reference.wps:Body: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wfs:GetFeature handle="GeoTools 10.2 WFS DataStore" maxFeatures="{maxFeatures}" outputFormat="{outputFormat}" resultType="results" service="WFS" version="{version}" srsName="{srsName}" {xmlns} xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" xmlns:gml="http://www.opengis.net/gml" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xmlns:ows="http://www.opengis.net/ows" xmlns:wfs="http://www.opengis.net/wfs"><wfs:Query srsName="{srsName}" typeName="{typeName}"> {properties}{filter}</wfs:Query></wfs:GetFeature>
